```{r}
library(readr)
birds<-read_csv("raptor_bird_data_aug_to_oct.csv")
birds_2019 <- subset(birds,Year==2019)
gold_ts<-ts(birds_2019$Golden_Eagle)
```

```{r}
library(ggfortify)
library(ggplot2)
autoplot(gold_ts)
```

```{r}
library(bayesforecast)
model1<-auto.sarima(gold_ts,seasonal = FALSE,max.d = 0)
```
```{r}
prior_summary(model1)
print(model1)
```

```{r}
pacf(model1$residuals)
```
```{r}
autoplot(forecast(object = model1,h = 90))
```
